Hi! My name is Pranay, I am currently a Doctoral Candidate supervised by Prof. Dr. Els Lefever at the Language and Translation Technology Team (LT3), UGent. My primary areas of interest include Cross-Lingual Supervision, Low-Resource NLP, Transfer Learning and Interpretability.
I have previously worked in the R&D Team of retail AI startup Paralleldots, before which I was a student at BITS Pilani, Goa.
In my free time I enjoy listening to progressive music, reading fantasy and I occasionally dabble with writing.

News

  • March ‘21: Teaching Assistant for Advanced Language Processing with Python
  • January ‘21: Reviewer for WASSA’21
  • July 29 ‘20: Attended the 10th Lisbon Machine Learning School
  • June 25 ‘20: Presented paper on Document Layout Analysis at ICIAR’20
  • Jan 30 ‘20: Attended CLIN’20 at Utrecht University, NL
